Name: BN Chews - Chewable Multivitamins
Short description:
BENEFITS
Improve vitality & nutritional support
SOLUTION FOR
Gastric Sleeve & Gastric Bypass Surgery
GREAT TASTE
Orange
Description:
Congratulations on taking the first step towards your new, healthier, happier life. Why are BN Chews Australia’s leading multivitamins used by Australian Bariatric patients, like you, after Weight Loss Surgery? They are formulated to ASMBS guidelines based on over 100,000 post-WLS patients' trials Our great-tasting orange-flavoured bariatric multivitamin chewable is super soluble and easy to digest. You get proper nutrition for your body as you successfully recover from Weight Loss Surgery. BN Multivitamins are extra potent (much more potent than your usual chemist variety) - Specifically designed to replenish the key nutrients that are poorly absorbed after Gastric Sleeve or Gastric Bypass Surgery. BNChews use the highest quality and most biologically available vitamins and minerals to increase absorption. BN Healthy are products you can trust. BN Healthy manufactures and packs your vitamins in Australia and works closely with local surgeons and dietitians to continually enhance our range and ingredients. BN Multi's meet all major nutritional guidelines: * Meets the recommended daily intakes as outlined in the American Society for Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery (ASMBS) Guidelines * Australian Therapeutic Goods Administration (TGA) approved for safety and purity * British Obesity and Metabolic Society Guidelines 2020 * European Guidelines on Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery  
Contains sugars, soya bean products, sulfites, and artificial sweeteners. Ingredients: Each tablet contains:
Betacarotene 2.3mg
Retinol acetate (Vitamin A 375 mcg RE) 431.25mcg
Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 60mg
Colecalciferol (Vitamin D3 500IU) 12.5mcg
d-alpha-Tocopheryl acid succinate (Vitamin E 151U) 12.4mg
Thiamine nitrate (Vitamin B1) 5mg
Riboflavin (Vitamin B2) 5mg
Calcium pantothenate Eq. Pantothenic acid (Vit B5) 5mg 4.6mg
Pyridoxine hydrochloride Equiv. Pyridoxine (Vit B6) 790mcg 650mcg
Mecobalamin (Co-Methylcobalamin) (Vitamin B12) 125mcg
Cyanocobalamin (Vit B12) 125mcg
Nicotinamide (Vitamin B3) 25mg
Calcium (as calcium citrate) Calcium (as calcium carbonate) Total Calcium 50mg 250mg 300.42mg
Folic Acid 250mcg
Inositol 10mg
Iron (as ferrous fumarate) 9mg
Magnesium (as heavy magnesium oxide) 52.5mg
Iodine (as potassium iodide) 75mcg
Copper (as cupric citrate Hemipentahydrate) 375mcg
Zinc (as zinc amino acid chelate) 7.5mg
Selenium (as selenomethionine) 15mcg
Manganese (as manganese amino acid chelate) 1mg
Chromium (as chromic chloride hexahydrate) 35mcg
Chromium (as chromium picolinate) 25mcg
Total Chromium 60mcg
Choline bitartrate 2.5mg
Molybdenum (as molybdenum trioxide) 37.5mcg
Biotin 150mcg
Directions & Usage:
Take 2 BN Chews per day with meals, or as directed by your healthcare professional. Always read the label and follow the directions for use. Safety Information:
  • If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.
  • The recommended daily amount of Vitamin A from all sources is 700 mcg retinol equivalents for women and 900 mcg for men. When taken in excess of 3000 mcg retinol equivalents Vitamin A can cause birth defects.
  • If you are pregnant or considering becoming pregnant do not take Vitamin A supplements without consulting your doctor or pharmacist.
  • Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet.
  • Not for the treatment of iron deficiency conditions.
  • Contains selenium which is toxic in high doses. A daily dose of 150 mcg for adults of selenium from dietary supplements should not be exceeded.
  • Contains sucralose.
  • Do not use if seal is broken or missing.
  • Store below 25 C.

Name: BN Caps - Capsule Multivitamins
Short description:
BENEFITS
Supports overall health & wellbeing
SOLUTION FOR
2 months after Weight Loss Surgery & beyond
CALCIUM-FREE
Best paired with BN Cal or BN Chocolate
Description:
With our busy lives, getting everything you need from diet alone takes work. You can feel confident that your BN Caps are here to help support the nutritional wellbeing of Weight Loss Surgery patients with two easy-to-swallow tasteless capsules daily. BN Caps are your long-term solution after the initial, post-surgical period of taking our BN Chews. BN Cal and BN Chocolate is the perfect partner product for BN Caps, which are calcium-free. The body cannot produce calcium on its own; taking a bariatric calcium supplement daily will prevent bones from becoming weak and brittle. BN Caps formula uses the highest quality and most biologically available vitamins and minerals, providing you with the best safety and pureness bariatric multivitamin capsules. BN Healthy manufactures and packs your vitamins in Australia and works closely with local surgeons and dietitians to continually enhance our range and ingredients. BNCaps meet all major nutritional guidelines: * Meets the recommended daily intakes as outlined in the American Society for Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery (ASMBS) Guidelines * Australian Therapeutic Goods Administration (TGA) approved for safety and purity * British Obesity and Metabolic Society Guidelines 2020 * European Guidelines on Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery
Ingredients No soy, lactose or gluten. Bovine gelatin capsule. Product contains soya bean products and phenylalanine. Each capsule contains:
Betacarotene 2.3mg
Retinol acetate (Vitamin A 375 mcg RE) 442.7mcg
Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) 60mg

d-alpha-Tocopheryl acid succinate (Vitamin E 15|U) 12.4mg

Mecobalamin(Co-Methylcobalamin) (Vitamin B12) 300mcg

Calcium folinate Equiv. folinic acid 347mcg 250mcg
Nicotinamide (Vitamin B3) 25mg
Phytomenadione (Vitamin K1) 70mcg
Inositol 10mg
Iron (as ferrous fumarate) 12mg
Magnesium (as heavy magnesium oxide) 52.5mg
Iodine (as potassium iodide) 75mcg

Directions & Usage
Take 2 BN Caps per day with meals, or as directed by your healthcare professional. Always read the label and follow the directions for use.
Safety Information
  • The recommended daily amount of Vitamin A from all sources is 700 mcg retinol equivalent for women and 900 mcg retinol equivalents for men.
  • If you are pregnant or considering becoming pregnant do not take Vitamin A supplements without consulting your doctor or pharmacist.
  • When taken in excess of 3000 micrograms of retinol equivalents Vitamin A can cause birth defects.
  • Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet.
  • Not for the treatment of iron deficiency conditions.
  • Contains selenium which is toxic in high doses. A daily dose of 150 mcg for adults of selenium from dietary supplements should not be exceeded.
  • The product contains soy/soybean and phenylalanine.
  • Do not use if seal is broken or missing.
  • Store below 25 C.

Name: BN Cal - Calcium Chewable Tablets
Short description: BENEFITS Strong bones & teeth SOLUTION FOR Malabsorption GREAT TASTE Chocolate Vanilla Calcium Chew As a new Gastric Sleeve patient I have had to buy a lot of products to find the best. Your BN Cal are by far the best calcium chews. Tasty, easy to swallow and has noticeably improved my overall health. - Kate
Description:
Product Description
Getting enough calcium is a challenge for Weight Loss Surgery (WLS) patients, but our BN Cal can make it easier for you to continue your day. BN Cal is tasty chocolate vanilla calcium citrate chews containing calcium and vitamin D, which are involved in the development and maintenance of bones and are essential for cardiovascular health. Calcium chews for bariatric patients are required to maximise bone health. A diet deficient in calcium can lead to osteoporosis in later life. Calcium may help prevent osteoporosis when dietary intake is inadequate. Calcium plays a role in various enzyme systems responsible for muscle contraction, fat digestion, and protein metabolism and assists in synthesising neurotransmitters and nerve conduction. Calcium citrate is superior to calcium carbonate and is best for absorption after WLS. BN Cal meets all major nutritional guidelines * Meets the recommended daily intakes as outlined in the American Society for Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery (ASMBS) Guidelines * ASMBS Guidelines call for 1,200-1,500mg calcium per day for patients in most bariatric procedure types * Australian Therapeutic Goods Administration (TGA) approved for safety and purity * British Obesity and Metabolic Society Guidelines 2020 * European Guidelines on Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery
Ingredients
Contains lactose, milk products, gluten, sugar alcohols, sugars, sucralose and sulfites. Each BN Cal contains:
Calcium citrate tetrahydrate Equiv. Calcium 948mg 200 mg
Colecalciferol (Vitamin D3 166.671U) 4.1mcg
Directions & Usage
Adults chew 2-5 BN Cal daily with meals or as directed by your healthcare professional. Always read the label and follow the directions for use.
Safety Information
  • Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.
  • Products containing mannitol and xylitol may have a laxative effect or cause diarrhoea.
  • Do not use if the seal is broken or missing.
  • Store below 25C.
Categories: VITAMINS & MINERALS > 90 Chewable Tablets, VITAMINS & MINERALS

Name: BN Iron - Iron Tablets plus Vitamin C
Short description: BENEFITS Improve energy, focus & sleep quality SOLUTIONS FOR Boosting iron plus vitamin C status FORMULATION Gentle on the stomach, without constipation or nausea
Description:
Product Description
Are you tired all the time? Taking iron plus vitamin c tablets may be the boost you need. BN Iron contains Iron (II) Bisglycinate for easy absorption. Iron Bisglycinate is gentler on the digestive system, reducing constipation and nausea associated with other forms of iron. Iron Bisglycinate has been chosen for superior iron storage. Iron is essential in synthesising haemoglobin in red blood cells, transporting oxygen around the body, and supporting energy levels. It can decrease fatigue caused by inadequate iron intake. *BN Healthy uses the highest quality and most biologically available nutrient forms to maximise absorption and storage.* BNIron are * Gluten-Free * Sugar-Free * No artificial colours BN Iron meets all major nutritional guidelines: * ASMBS recommends a minimum of 18mg of iron per day, and many female patients require 45-60mg * Australian Therapeutic Goods Administration (TGA) approved for safety and purity * British Obesity and Metabolic Society Guidelines 2020 * European Guidelines on Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery
Ingredients
Each tablet contains:
Iron (Il) Glycinate Equivalent to Iron 87.66mg 24mg
Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) 25mg
Directions & Usage
Take 1 BNIron daily with meals or as directed by your healthcare professional. Always read the label and follow the directions for use.
Safety Information
  • Not for the treatment of iron deficiency conditions.
  • Vitamins and minerals can only be of assistance if dietary intake is inadequate.
  • Do not use if tamper-evident seal is missing, torn or broken.
  • Store below 25C.
Categories: VITAMINS & MINERALS > 30 Film Coated Tablets, VITAMINS & MINERALS

Name: BN B12 - Vitamin B12 Melts
Description:
Product Description
You’ve been having a foggy brain quite frequently lately, even though you’ve been hydrating, exercising, and eating the right foods. You may need to take BN B12. Our fast-dissolving BN B12 melts under your tongue in a great-tasting strawberry flavour. It’s a great and simple way to absorb additional B12 delivering 1000 mcg in each tablet. The B vitamin family is created from eight water-soluble vitamins that play essential roles in our metabolism and synthesis of red blood cells. BN B12 uses Mecobalamin, an active form of B12 for better uptake and storage - especially important after WLS where B12 absorption is permanently compromised. * No artificial colours BN B12 meets all major nutritional guidelines * ASMBS recommends 350mcg - 1000mcg daily B12 intake * British Obesity and Metabolic Society Guidelines 2020 * European Guidelines on Metabolic and Bariatric Surgery
Ingredients
  • Free from peanuts, tree nuts, lactose, eggs, sesame, fish, shellfish and soy.
  • Contains wheat and sulfites.
  • Each BN B12 melt contains 1000 microgram of Me-cobalamin (co-methylcobalamin) Vitamin B12.
Directions & Usage
Take no more than 1 daily, or as recommended by your healthcare professional. Always read the label and follow the directions for use.
Safety Information
  • Recommended for supporting dietary inadequacy, only take as needed.
  • Helps to prevent dietary B12 deficiency when used under guidance from your health care professional.
  • Vitamins and minerals can only be of assistance if dietary intake is inadequate.
  • Do not use if tamper-evident seal is missing, torn or broken.
  • Store below 25C.
Categories: VITAMINS & MINERALS > 60 Strawberry Melts, VITAMINS & MINERALS

Name: Bn Collagen
Short description: BENEFITS Aids fat loss & curbs cravings SOLUTION FOR Prevents muscle tissue wastage during rapid weight loss TASTELESS Can be added to any food & drinks
Description:
Product Description
BN Multi supplies high-quality protein used by Australian bariatric patients, like you, after Weight Loss Surgery (WLS). BN Pure Pro is an unflavoured WPI grass-fed powder that is versatile for those who want additional protein to their favourite meals and beverages. Protein deficiency can lead to; * Hair loss * Slow wound healing * Lowered immunity * Hormonal imbalances * Low mood * ASMBS recommends post-surgical bariatric patients states between 60-80g per day BN Healthy supports Weight Loss Surgery patients with a simple and beneficial way to reach their daily protein goal. BN Pure Pro is nothing else but specifically chosen for WLS patients - Pure Whey Protein Isolate for sustained release and satisfaction. * Gluten-free * Sugar-free * No artificial colours * Low lactose
Ingredients
Whey Protein Isolate, Sunflower Lecithin (0.02% trace). Contains milk.
Servings per package 30
Serving size (1 scoop) 30g
Per Serve 30g 100g
Energy (kj) 492 1640
Calories 117.6 392
Protein 27g 90g
Carbohydrates 0.91g 3.02g
Sugars 0.30g 0.99g
Fat Total 0.36g 1.20g
Saturated 0.11g 0.38g
Sodium 46.8mg 156mg
Gluten 0mg 0mg
Essential Amino Acids:
Isoleucine 6.0g
Leucine 9.0g
Lysine 7.8g
Methionine 1.8g
Phenylalanine 2.6g
Threonine 6.89g
Tryptophan 0.89g
Valine 5.4g
Non-Essential Amino Acids:
Histidine 1.1g
Alanine 5.2g
Arginine 1.8g
Aspartic Acid 10.1g
Cysteine 2.1g
Glutamic Acid 13.8g
Glycine 1.7g
Proline 5.6g
Serine 4.2g

Directions & Usage
Add 1 scoop (30g) of BN Pure Pro WPI, providing you with 27g complete protein to your food (i.e. pudding, mashed potatoes, yoghurt), smoothies or baked foods. Consume product once daily with adequate fluid intake or as directed under medical advice. Always read the label and follow the directions for use.
Safety Information
  • Do not use it if the seal is broken or missing.
  • Formulated supplementary sports food
  • Not to be used as a sole source of nutrition
  • Not to be used by those under the age of 15 or pregnant women.
  • Allergen: packed under HACCP conditions in a facility that also packs dairy, nuts and dried fruit.
  • Store below 25C.
